title: OSBall Courts
name: OSBall Courts
description:
A Map by Jason

Open Source Ballgame Project.
http://osball.org
Played in bocci ball courts.
This is a map with known locations of such courts, or similar playable terrain.

properties.name: OSBall Courts in McCarren Park, Williamsburg, Brooklyn
properties.description: Posted by Jason

properties.name: OSBall court - starbucks drivethru
properties.description: Posted by Jasondrive through at starbucks on MLK, portland, ora bit dark, a sketchy drainage grate right in the center, but seems like a non-bust, and the size is right on.

properties.name: OSBall court behind Wells Fargo Bank
properties.description: Posted by Jason  nw flanders st near broadway, portland, orwith the heavy use of the bocci courts in the park, and with the bocci league in full swing this time of year, we have been forced underground, to play on a makeshift court in the drive through part of the Wells Fargo parking lot. This is actually fine, the surrounding walls make for less chasing due to leadfooting, and the extra width is actually a nice change. the downsides are, the constant stench of urine, and the lack of curbs at the bases allows for some extra controversy regarding inbound rolling kicks. I do highly recommend this court though, and if we keep playing afternoon games, this will certainly become a regular hangout for the teams.

properties.name: OSBall court in Metro Building Courtyard
properties.description: Posted by Jason NE Irving & 6th Ave, Portland, ORlikely to be empty very early, like 6pm, nice and level, clean, and close to convention center.

properties.name: OSBall court on pedestrian bridge
properties.description: Posted by Jason NE Lloyd Blvd behind Convention Center, Portland, ORwhat this lacks in out of bounds options, it makes up for in ceiling ricochet options!! watch out for, and yield to bikes.

properties.name: OSBall court, Burgerville Drivethrough
properties.description: Posted by JasonMLK & NE Hassalo, Portland, ORafter 10pm or 11pm this is a great, well lit spot to rock the osball

properties.name: Osball Courts , Pearl District, Portland
properties.description: Posted by Jason  NW Parkblocks near Glisan St. Portland, ORA fast paced and highly energetic game, OSBall borrows heavily from many existing sports, such as cricket, soccer, kickball, dodgeball and bocci. Read or edit the game\'s rules. Browse the OSBall Team Pages, maybe you\'ll find a team to join, or you can always form your own Team! See a map of OSBall courts (and add courts you know about). Read stories and highlights from games, or post your own.

properties.name: makeshift OSBall court, sidewalk with bushes and wall
properties.description: Posted by JasonWest Side of Convention Center - NE 1st Street, Portland, ORdepending on the ball, the bushes could be a great new bumper type.

properties.name: osball court, between planters
properties.description: Posted by Jasonin front of the convention center, portland, ori suspect this would result in a security guard confrontation, but, you never know, maybe they could be coerced into joining a team.
